text: Nimen hai meiyou jingli nimen de qian ren suo jingli de [kaoyan, zainan], nandao nimen jiu renwei nimen jiang jinru leyuan ma? Tamen [qian ren] zaoshoule qiongkun he huannan, shenzhi zhenjing, yizhi shizhe [mu sheng] he gen ta de xinshimen dou shuo:“An la de yuanzhu he shi jianglin ne?” Xuzhi, an la de yuanzhu que shi linjin de.
